sn9.1:1.2: ekam samayam annataro bhikkhu kosalesu viharati annatarasmim vanasande.
sn9.1:1.3: Tena kho pana samayena so bhikkhu divaviharagato papake akusale vitakke vitakketi gehanissite.
sn9.1:1.4: Atha kho ya tasmim vanasande adhivattha devata tassa bhikkhuno anukampika atthakama tam bhikkhum samvejetukama yena so bhikkhu tenupasankami; upasankamitva tam bhikkhum gathahi ajjhabhasi:
sn9.1:5.1: Atha kho so bhikkhu taya devataya samvejito samvegamapaditi.
